rules_text:
Create X 1/1 white Eye creature tokens. If this spell is a copy, X is the number of Eyes you control.
Bloodborn 3–{W}{W} [i]({W}{W}: Exile this from your graveyard with three gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]
